alert.note: Alert for Rogers (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 23 at 7:36PM CDT until September 23 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ROGERS AND NORTHWESTERN WAGONER COUNTIES... At 736 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Verdigris, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Broken Arrow... Claremore... Coweta... Catoosa... Verdigris... Inola... Taiwah... Tiawah... Oneta... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 233 and 259. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
